Business description: Apple Inc.

Apple Inc. specializes in the design, manufacture and marketing of computer hardware and music supports. Net sales break down by family of products and services as follows:

- telephone products (52.1%): iPhone brand;

- peripheral devices (10.5%): screens, storage systems, printers, video camera, memory cards, server, switches, etc.;

- computers (10.2%): laptops (MacBook, MacBook Air and MacBook Pro brands) and PCs (iMac, Mac mini, Mac Pro and Xserve);

- music support (7.4%): music readers iPod and iPad and accessories;

- other (19.8%): software, maintenance service and Internet access service, etc.

Net sales are distributed geographically as follows: Americas (42.4%), China/Hong Kong/Taiwan (18.9%), Japan (6.3%), Asia/Pacific (7.7%) and Europe/India/Middle East/Africa (24.7%).

Number of employees: 161,000

Group companies: Apple Inc.

NameCategory and Sector

Apple Operations Europe Ltd.

Apple Operations Europe Ltd.

Computer Processing HardwareElectronic Technology

Part of Apple, Inc., Apple Operations Europe Ltd. is an Irish company that manufactures and markets personal computers. The company is located in Ireland.

Computer Processing Hardware

Apple India Pvt Ltd.

Apple India Pvt Ltd.

Electronics/Appliance StoresRetail Trade

Part of Apple, Inc., Apple (India) Pvt Ltd. is an Indian company that provides high-quality content and services like Apple TV+, Apple Music, and iCloud to help users maximize their device experience. Founded in 1996, the company is based in Bangalore, India. The company offers durable and powerful devices with 5G connectivity, including the new iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 14 Pro Max, iPhone 14, iPhone 14 Plus, and iPhone SE.

Electronics/Appliance Stores

Apple (UK) Ltd.

Apple (UK) Ltd.

Electronic Production EquipmentElectronic Technology

Apple Computer (UK) Ltd. manufactures portable personal computers. The company's products include operating system software, wireless equipment, and digital music players. The company has operating divisions in the United States, Canada, Japan, Australia, and Asia. The company is headquartered in Uxbridge, UK.

Electronic Production Equipment

Apple Operations Ltd.

Apple Operations Ltd.

Miscellaneous Commercial ServicesCommercial Services

Part of Apple, Inc., Apple Operations Ltd. is an Irish company that engages in trade intermediate of particular products. The company is located in Ireland.
